S LI.ST

A list of all the upcoming underground music events I can find. For sharing! Not promoting.

CDMX CDMX NYC

Facebook & NYC IG work in progress

All genres

From booty-bumping perreo to modern jazz. Tulum house to sick-nasty-scary-angry-dark-techno. I find it all.

Rooftops, raves, galleries, etc.

Art galleries with open bars. Basements with sweaty walls. Rooftops with tacos and sunsets. My pants. And so much more.

My S List

I go to a lot of events. Good, ugly, obscure, life changing, life threatening, all sorts of events. My tastes are refined-er. Trust.

About

S List began as a finsta for following the underground music scene in CDMX. When I realized some of my friends could use some help with their nightlife, I spread the word. I remained anonymous as a personal challenge, for a long-term gag, and due to practical reasons.

I enjoy the anonymity. It lets me be more expressive.

SlayList‚Ñ¢

There's two S Lists. The one described above, and another list for the events I'm personally looking forward to (pulic). I currently enjoy raunchy provacative dark techno, some "experimental", and "unique" events.

Self-Imposed Rules:

I will share every event that comes my way without discrimination.

The goal is to share as many underground events with as many people as possible. Even if I don't like a particular venue, event, or organization, I will share their event with the rest of the community. Everyone should be able to make their own opinions, judgements, and choices. As a self-proclaimed semi-professional event-sharer I cannot become a curator for the general project. I will bring this up to a vote if an issue ever arrises that calls for me to stop sharing events from a venue or organization for some crime against the community. Use your imagination, or ask me what I mean.

I keep a seperate list of events that I am personally looking forward to based on my tastes which are completely subjective. I like dark techno, experimental, and "unique" events. There's a few people that appreciate that and count on me for that list so I will continue to share my personal curated S List of events alongside everything else.

I will never accept any compensation for sharing or recommending events.

All events I see will get shared for free. I only hope people will return the courtesy and share this project as well. More eyes, more leads, more events, more options for everyone. Everyone wins when there are fewer barriers to information.

I will always be open to suggestions, feedback, and criticism.

The biggest driver for the growth and recognition of the S List community is the feedback and advice from the local community. Up until the previous week every single design, layout, and operational decision has been voted on by the communnity. Even the colors I use and where I sort the events has been voted on. I appreciate the nuanced opinions and feedback and I will always rely on the community for your perspective.

Let's share differently.

How to make your own S List:

  1. start by following atleast 1 DJ/event organizer/promoter
  2. follow every relevant account they tag in their posts/stories
  3. browse your feeds for event posts and reshare them to your story
  4. after "you're all caught up", highlight all your your stories by date
  5. re-highlight the most interesting events as a Special List (subjective)

  6. optional: use your Special List to better plan your nightlife adventures
  7. optional: share with friends and/or develop an event sharing community
  8. optional: ask your beloved community to spread your project

  9. repeat the steps above as often as you can until you don't want to
  • Do this for yourself (finding events) and you will never get tired.
  • Alternate and ice your thumbs.
  • Share for the sake of sharing.

Support the S List!

If this project has your nightlife, please consider supporting. There are many ways to help; the following are just a few ideas:

Send leads!

What's an event sharing project without events? Please send flyers, screenshots, post-its, voice recordings, videos, set times etc.- anything event related.

social media s@sli.st

Perks for the community

Help me build engagement for both of our projects. Make some lucky members of the S List community feel special. Give them more reasons to stick around.

  • discounts
  • free tickets
  • raffles
  • lifetime pass? :)
  • open bar?
  • casual drugs
  • a cigarette?

Advertising materials

I am looking to experiment with physical advertising. If you can directly supply promotional materials, please message me on social media or email.

  • t-shirts, masks, hats, etc.
  • banners, flyers, stickers, "business" cards
  • a volunteer's forehead to tattoo
social media s@sli.st
